name: Biking: the case of the stolen fare
name_original: Biking: the case of the stolen fare
description:
There's a lot to think about on this bike ride home from work

Submission for the BenBonk Jam #1- theme was "trust no one"

Game made within 72 hours timeframe.

Avoid distractions on the road while you recount your workday before making an accusation. Was it your coworkers that stole your money, or did you just forget it at home? There's 4 endings to this short game. No death, just gather as much info as you can before you get home.

Thanks to Alyssa for the story dialogue and Jake for the music

Controls: Arrow Keys
